definitions.example: I'll come tomorrow, if you wish it.

definitions.definition: To hope (+ object clause with may or in present subjunctive).
(followed by for) To hope (for a particular outcome).
(ditransitive) To bestow (a thought or gesture) towards (someone or something).
definitions.example: We wish you a Merry Christmas.

definitions.definition: (followed by to and an infinitive) To request or desire to do an activity.
To recommend; to seek confidence or favour on behalf of.
